title: Amazing Remodeled 1 Bed w/ WD In-Unit & Central air
posting_body: This is a top floor 1 bedroom with amazing views in Wrigleyville.
- MODERN Cabinetry, SS & Stone Counter Tops
- 1 Large bedroom w/ plenty of closet space
(This is a new construction project in progress.
Photos of recent New construction by same team)
- Free bike storage in designated bike room
- Covered Parking available for an additional fee
- Close to Wrigley field and nightlife
ICM Properties Inc. is a professional management company since 1966.
